Package org.elasticsearch.xpack.ql.execution.search

Interface FieldExtraction

All Known Implementing Classes:
AggExtractorInput, AggNameInput, AggPathInput, AggRef, AttributeInput, BinaryArithmeticPipe, BinaryComparisonPipe, BinaryDateTimePipe, BinaryLogicPipe, BinaryMathPipe, BinaryOptionalMathPipe, BinaryPipe, BinaryStringNumericPipe, BinaryStringStringPipe, CasePipe, ComputedRef, ConcatFunctionPipe, ConditionalPipe, ConstantInput, DateAddPipe, DateDiffPipe, DatePartPipe, DateTimeFormatPipe, DateTimeParsePipe, DateTruncPipe, FieldReference, GlobalCountRef, GroupByRef, HitExtractorInput, InPipe, InsertFunctionPipe, LeafInput, LocateFunctionPipe, MetricAggRef, MultiPipe, NonExecutableInput, NullIfPipe, Pipe, PivotColumnRef, ReferenceInput, ReplaceFunctionPipe, ScorePipe, ScriptFieldRef, SearchHitFieldRef, StartsWithFunctionPipe, StDistancePipe, SubstringFunctionPipe, ThreeArgsDateTimePipe, TopHitsAggRef, UnaryPipe
public interface FieldExtraction
An interface for something that needs to extract field(s) from a result.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    collectFields​(QlSourceBuilder sourceBuilder)
    Add whatever is necessary to the SearchSourceBuilder in order to fetch the field.
    boolean
    supportedByAggsOnlyQuery()
    Is this aggregation supported in an "aggregation only" query (true) or should it force a scroll query (false)?

  • Method Details

    • collectFields

      void collectFields​(QlSourceBuilder sourceBuilder)
      Add whatever is necessary to the SearchSourceBuilder in order to fetch the field. This can include tracking the score, _source fields, doc values fields, and script fields.

    • supportedByAggsOnlyQuery

      boolean supportedByAggsOnlyQuery()
      Is this aggregation supported in an "aggregation only" query (true) or should it force a scroll query (false)?
